i want to connect TCP/IP over SSH after providing valid details when i click on test connection button the window closed without showing any error or message 

#weiredexperience

I had a really really hard time getting this working for a few days.
I finally figured it out though.

1) You need to make sure mysql is using its own users and passwords (not your systems users and passwords!)

2) you must run this command in the terminal (sudo snap connect mysql-workbench-community:password-manager-service)

Because it is a snap package it doesn't have permissions, so you need to run that command to give it access.
summary: Hard to get working if you don't know how

description: это говнище еще пилить и пилить

After the sudo snap install...
REMEMBER to RUN sudo snap connect mysql-workbench-community:password-manager-service

Even terminal will give you this output, it actually gave permission:
snap "mysql-workbench-community" is already installed, see 'snap help
    refresh'

Else you can not connect to any DB

There are a lot of reviews on here about not being able to connect to the server. This is a common problem, but can be resolved by configuring a few things.

Run 'sudo snap connect mysql-workbench-community:password-manager-service :password-manager-service'

This allows the workbench to use the systems password service, and will eliminate the problems saving passwords to the keychain in the connections menu.

To resolve the unable to connect error, you need to create a new user, say "admin", set a password for it, and grant it privileges. You are no longer able to remotely connect to the db server using root.
Ease of use and offers the required features.
Run 'sudo snap connect mysql-workbench-community:password-manager-service :password-manager-service' and it will connect as it was mentioned before.

Para que funcione con Ubuntu 20.04, es necesario otorgarle permisos, ya que usa conexiones ssh y Password Manager.
En un terminal ejecutar:
snap connect mysql-workbench-community: password-manager-service
snap connect mysql-workbench-community: ssh-keys
Si no les funciona con ubuntu, solo arriba en donde dice permisos, activar las dos ultimas opciones y con eso se soluciona el problema!!
https://askubuntu.com/questions/1230752/how-can-i-install-mysql-workbench-on-ubuntu-20-04-lts

Работаю с приложением версии 8.0 под Ubuntu 22.04.
1. Нет поддержки темной темы, приходится переключаться на светлую на уровне всей системы, иначе половина информации не видна. Впервые такое вижу.
2. По умолчанию, в режиме выполнения запросов к базе, не выводится окно Action Output. Оказалось, оно просто не вписывается по высоте и его надо достать мышкой, потянув за низ окна (под Result Grid), что абсолютно неочевидно.

На Ubuntu из коробки не работает. Нужно выполнить следующие действия: 1) Открыть терминал 2) sudo apt update 3) sudo apt install mysql-server 4) В workbench создаем новое соединение. При тесте соединения у меня ошибка MySQL access denied. Фиксим следующим образом 5) sudo mysql 6) ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'your_new_password'; 7) FLUSH PRIVILEGES; 8) SELECT user, plugin FROM mysql.user; 8) exit; Теперь должно работать
